headline: Sunrun PG&E Battery Project Highlights Virtual Power Plant Potential For Investors
summary: Sunrun and PG&E completed a large-scale storage dispatch season using Sunrun's distributed power plant built from residential batteries. More than 1,000 customers participated, with the aggregated systems dispatched over 50 times to support the local grid. The program operated with nearly 99% accuracy in following PG&E's instructions, helping reduce the need for traditional grid upgrades. For investors watching NasdaqGS:RUN, this project gives a concrete example of how Sunrun's residential...
